extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the GitLab server is running a vulnerable version by verifying the installed version against the affected version ranges.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the GitLab server running a vulnerable version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update GitLab to the Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the GitLab server to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enable and enforce multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users to enhance security.
